Sampath Kumar Billakuduru

Udostr. 7 · 45472 Mülheim an der Ruhr · billakuduru93@email.com

I’m a Cloud & DevOps Engineer with a strong focus on building scalable, reliable, and secure infrastructure. Over the past few years, I’ve worked across different teams and environments—whether supporting production systems, automating workflows, or improving CI/CD pipelines. I enjoy solving problems, learning new tools, and simplifying complex systems.

Experience

SRE/Platform Engineer

DEVK Versicherung

At DEVK, I work as part of the platform team to improve scalability, reliability, and observability of our Kubernetes-based infrastructure. I’ve developed custom Helm charts and Docker images to streamline deployments, especially for our Pega systems. I also implemented Kibana dashboards to give teams real-time visibility into system metrics. In addition to that, I manage Amazon RDS databases, automate infrastructure using Terraform and Terragrunt, and maintain CI/CD pipelines with GitLab. I also implemented Cilium network policies to secure traffic in a multi-tenant Kubernetes environment.

January 2025 - Present

Cloud Solution System Enginer

Tivian XI GmbH

At Tivian, I focused on managing and automating cloud infrastructure in AWS. I used Terraform and Terragrunt to provision EKS clusters and deployed applications with Helm and ArgoCD. I built CI/CD pipelines using Concourse and integrated them with Bitbucket for continuous delivery. I also set up monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana and handled critical support tasks like SSL, infrastructure outages, and onboarding/offboarding of customers. My role required close collaboration with both DevOps and IT operations teams.

October 2022 - October 2024

DevOps Engineer/System Administrator

Monitorfish GmbH

At Monitorfish, I was the first and only DevOps engineer, responsible for setting up and maintaining the entire AWS-based infrastructure. I led the migration from Docker to Kubernetes, implemented CI/CD pipelines using GitLab, and managed centralized logging with the ELK stack. I also worked on IoT projects using AWS Greengrass, building custom solutions to send alerts via MS Teams in case of device connectivity issues. It was a hands-on role that allowed me to shape DevOps practices from the ground up.

October 2020 - October 2022

Workflow

Interests

Outside of work, I enjoy staying active and spending time with friends through sports. I’m especially passionate about outdoor games like cricket and badminton—they help me stay energized and focused.

I also enjoy indoor games such as chess and carrom, which challenge my strategic thinking and give me a chance to unwind in a different way.
